Uses of Class
com.gmail.mordress.epamproject.exceptions.PersistentException

  • Packages that use PersistentException 
    Package Description
    com.gmail.mordress.epamproject.action
    Contains classes-controllers for general actions.
    com.gmail.mordress.epamproject.action.administrator
    Contains classes-controllers for administrator's actions.
    com.gmail.mordress.epamproject.action.bookmaker
    Contains classes-controllers for bookmaker's actions.
    com.gmail.mordress.epamproject.action.user
    Contains classes-controllers for user's actions.
    com.gmail.mordress.epamproject.controller
    Contains classes-controllers for filtering and processing user's requests.
    com.gmail.mordress.epamproject.dao.interfaces
    Contains dao-layer interfaces.
    com.gmail.mordress.epamproject.dao.mysql
    Contains dao-layer classes for interact with mysql.
    com.gmail.mordress.epamproject.dao.pool
    Contains realisation database connection pool.
    com.gmail.mordress.epamproject.services.ifaces
    Contains service-layer interfaces.
    com.gmail.mordress.epamproject.services.impls
    Contains service-layer realisation.
